caption.center: STATE OF OREGON, DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN RESOURCES, on behalf of the State of
California, Appellant, and CYNTHIA LEWIS, Obligee, v. RANDY FARDEN,

opinion.posture: Appeal from Circuit Court, Columbia County. Steven B. Reed, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Judy C. Lucas, Assistant Attorney General, argued the cause for appellant. With her on the brief were Hardy Myers, Attorney General, and Mary H. Williams, Solicitor General.
No appearance for respondent.
opinion.panel: Before EDMONDS, Presiding Judge, and ARMSTRONG and SCHUMAN, Judges.
opinion.opinion_text: Judgment modified by deleting findings 3 and 4 and the final paragraph; affirmed as modified. State of Oregon DCS v. Anderson,189 Or. App. 162, 74 P.3d 1149 (2003).Page 579
